Okay, use a little gray matter here....if it's a FIRST RUN movie still in the theaters, then it's probably a cam. If it's within about two weeks of DVD release, then you can get a DVD quality download, maybe without some of the extra features, but, heck it fits in a DVD5, right?

Deal with it. If it's not a cam, then the poster SHOULD let you know one way or the other. Most quality guys give a ton of info.
